---

import { Cards, Callout } from 'nextra/components'

# Vendor Guide

Welcome! This guide will help you manage your restaurant on the CurryDash platform.

<Callout type="success">
  Ready to start serving authentic Sri Lankan cuisine to Victoria, Australia?
</Callout>

## Getting Started

<Cards>
  <Cards.Card title="Seller Portal" href="/vendors/seller-portal">
    Access dashboard, view orders, manage settings
  </Cards.Card>
  <Cards.Card title="Menu Management" href="/vendors/menu-management">
    Add dishes, set prices, manage availability
  </Cards.Card>
  <Cards.Card title="Orders" href="/vendors/orders">
    Accept orders, update status, handle delivery
  </Cards.Card>
  <Cards.Card title="Payments" href="/vendors/payments">
    View earnings, payout schedule, transactions
  </Cards.Card>
</Cards>

## Seller Portal Access

Access the Seller Portal at: **https://seller.currydash.com**

Need an account? Contact: vendors@currydash.com

## Quick Links

- [Order Management](/vendors/orders)
- [Menu Setup](/vendors/menu-management)
- [Payment Dashboard](/vendors/payments)
- [Analytics](/vendors/analytics)

## Support

For vendor support, contact:
- Email: vendors@currydash.com
- Phone: Available in Seller Portal
